name: The Leukocyte
description:
You are a lonely white blood cell attempting to slow the spread of COVID-19, but you have limited resources available.

You must collect resources to enable speed boost and develop strength to surge-attack the virus.

If you come in contact with the virus without surging, then you will die and leave the body defenseless.

Controls:

Action: Controller (Xbox 360) / Keyboard
Movement: Left Joy Stick (LS) / Arrow Keys
Speed Boost: Right Trigger (RT) / M Key
Attack Surge: Right Face Button (B) / N Key
Start Game: Any Face Button (YXBA) / Any Keyboard Key (except Q)
Restart Game: Start Button / Space Bar
Toogle Sound (Keyboard Only): Q Key

Note: Movement and boost are both analog when using a controller but digital when using a keyboard

Game created by Kevin Quigley using Game Maker Studio 2

https://kevinquigley.net/ 

https://hydegriffen.itch.io/
